{{ddcl|since=c++11|
~promise();
}}

Abandons the shared state:
* if the shared state is ready, [[cpp/thread/promise|releases]] it.
* if the shared state is not ready, stores an exception object of type {{lc|std::future_error}} with an error condition {{lc|std::future_errc::broken_promise}}, makes the shared state ready and releases it.
